+ <template>

+ <script setup>

+   NotificationsOffOutline

+ 
+ const message = useMessage()
+ 
+ // ç­›é€‰çŠ¶æ€
+ const activeFilter = ref('all')
+ 
+ // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé€šçŸ¥æ•°æ®
+ const notifications = ref([
+   {
+     id: 1,
+     type: 'system',
+     title: 'ç³»ç»Ÿæ›´æ–°',
+     message: 'NewsLook ç³»ç»Ÿå·²æ›´æ–°åˆ° v2.0ï¼Œæ–°å¢ç°ä»£åŒ–ç•Œé¢è®¾è®¡',
+     time: new Date(Date.now() - 1000 * 60 * 30), // 30åˆ†é’Ÿå‰
+     read: false
+   },
+   {
+     id: 2,
+     type: 'crawler',
+     title: 'çˆ¬è™«ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ',
+     message: 'æ–°æµªè´¢ç»çˆ¬è™«å·²å®Œæˆæ•°æ®é‡‡é›†ï¼Œå…±è·å– 156 æ¡æ–°é—»',

+     message: 'æ•°æ®åº“å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´å·²ä½¿ç”¨ 85%ï¼Œå»ºè®®æ¸…ç†æ—§æ•°æ®',

+     id: 5,

+     message: 'è…¾è®¯è´¢ç»çˆ¬è™«è¿æ¥è¶…æ—¶ï¼Œå·²è‡ªåŠ¨é‡è¯•',

+     read: true

+ // ç­›é€‰åçš„é€šçŸ¥
+ const filteredNotifications = computed(() => {
+   if (activeFilter.value === 'all') {
+     return notifications.value
+   }
+   return notifications.value.filter(n => n.type === activeFilter.value)
+ })
+ 
+ // è·å–é€šçŸ¥å›¾æ ‡
+ const getNotificationIcon = (type) => {
+   const iconMap = {
+     system: InformationCircleOutline,
+     crawler: CloudDownloadOutline,
+     data: DatabaseOutline,
+     warning: WarningOutline,
+     error: CloseCircleOutline,
+     success: CheckmarkCircleOutline
+   }
+   return iconMap[type] || InformationCircleOutline
+ }
+ 
+ // è·å–é€šçŸ¥é¢œè‰²
+ const getNotificationColor = (type) => {
+   const colorMap = {
+     system: '#2080f0',
+     crawler: '#18a058',
+     data: '#722ed1',
+     warning: '#f0a020',
+     error: '#d03050',
+     success: '#52c41a'
+   }
+   return colorMap[type] || '#666'
+ }
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
+ const formatTime = (time) => {
+   const now = new Date()
+   const diff = now - time
+   const minutes = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60))
+   const hours = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60 * 60))
+   const days = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24))
+   
+   if (minutes < 60) {
+     return `${minutes}åˆ†é’Ÿå‰`
+   } else if (hours < 24) {
+     return `${hours}å°æ—¶å‰`
+   } else if (days < 7) {
+     return `${days}å¤©å‰`
+   } else {
+     return time.toLocaleDateString()
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ ‡è®°ä¸ºå·²è¯»
+ const markAsRead = (id) => {
+   const notification = notifications.value.find(n => n.id === id)
+   if (notification && !notification.read) {
+     notification.read = true
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å…¨éƒ¨æ ‡è®°ä¸ºå·²è¯»
+ const markAllAsRead = () => {
+   notifications.value.forEach(n => {
+     n.read = true
+   })
+   message.success('æ‰€æœ‰é€šçŸ¥å·²æ ‡è®°ä¸ºå·²è¯»')
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ é™¤é€šçŸ¥
+ const removeNotification = (id) => {
+   const index = notifications.value.findIndex(n => n.id === id)
+   if (index !== -1) {
+     notifications.value.splice(index, 1)
+     message.success('é€šçŸ¥å·²åˆ é™¤')
+   }
+ }
+ </script>

+ <style scoped>

+ const handleStatClick = (key) => {

+ const formatTime = (time) => {
+   const now = new Date()
+   const diff = now - time
+   const minutes = Math.floor(diff / (1000 * 60))
+   
+   if (minutes < 60) {
+     return `${minutes}åˆ†é’Ÿå‰`
+   } else {
+     const hours = Math.floor(minutes / 60)
+     return `${hours}å°æ—¶å‰`
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const getSourceColor = (source) => {
+   const colors = {
+     'æ–°æµªè´¢ç»': { color: '#ff6b6b' },
+     'ä¸œæ–¹è´¢å¯Œ': { color: '#4ecdc4' },
+     'è…¾è®¯è´¢ç»': { color: '#45b7d1' },
+     'ç½‘æ˜“è´¢ç»': { color: '#96ceb4' },

+   }
+   return colors[source] || { color: '#95a5a6' }
+ }

+ const getStatusType = (status) => {
+   const typeMap = {
+     running: 'success',
+     warning: 'warning',
+     error: 'error',
+     stopped: 'default'
+   }
+   return typeMap[status] || 'default'
+ }
+ 
+ const getStatusColor = (status) => {
+   const colorMap = {
+     running: '#52c41a',
+     warning: '#fa8c16',
+     error: '#ff4d4f',
+     stopped: '#d9d9d9'
+   }
+   return colorMap[status] || '#d9d9d9'
+ }

+ const getStatusIcon = (status) => {
+   const iconMap = {
+     running: CheckmarkCircleOutline,
+     warning: WarningOutline,
+     error: CloseCircleOutline,
+     stopped: TimeOutline
+   }
+   return iconMap[status] || CheckmarkCircleOutline
+ }

+ const initTrendChart = () => {
+   if (!trendChart.value) return
+   
+   const chart = echarts.init(trendChart.value)
+   
+   const option = {
+     grid: {
+       top: 20,

+     },

+   
+   // å“åº”å¼
+   window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
+     chart.resize()
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ const initSourceChart = () => {
+   if (!sourceChart.value) return
+   
+   const chart = echarts.init(sourceChart.value)
+   
+   const option = {

+ #!/usr/bin/env python3

+ """
+ NewsLook ç°ä»£åŒ–å‰ç«¯å¯åŠ¨å™¨
+ ä½¿ç”¨Vue 3 + Naive UIçš„ç°ä»£åŒ–ç•Œé¢

+ import webbrowser

+ import signal

+ from pathlib import Path
+ 
+ class FrontendLauncher:
+     def __init__(self):
+         self.project_root = Path(__file__).parent
+         self.frontend_port = 3000
+         self.backend_port = 5000
+         self.processes = []
+         
+     def check_dependencies(self):
+         """æ£€æŸ¥å¿…è¦çš„ä¾èµ–"""
+         print("ğŸ” æ£€æŸ¥ç¯å¢ƒä¾èµ–...")
+         
+         # æ£€æŸ¥Node.js

+             result = subprocess.run(['node', '--version'],

+             print("   ä¸‹è½½åœ°å€: https://nodejs.org/")
+             return False
+

+             result = subprocess.run(['npm', '--version'], 
+                                    capture_output=True, text=True)

+         except FileNotFoundError:
+             print("âŒ é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ°npm")
+             return False
+             
+         return True
+     
+     def install_dependencies(self):
+         """å®‰è£…å‰ç«¯ä¾èµ–"""
+         print("\nğŸ“¦ å®‰è£…å‰ç«¯ä¾èµ–...")
+         
+         # æ£€æŸ¥package.jsonæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨

+             return False
+             
+         # å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–
+         try:
+             env = os.environ.copy()
+             env['FORCE_COLOR'] = '1'  # å¯ç”¨å½©è‰²è¾“å‡º
+             
+             process = subprocess.Popen(
+                 ['npm', 'install'],
+                 cwd=self.project_root,
+                 env=env,

+                 universal_newlines=True,
+                 bufsize=1

+                 print("âœ… ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…å®Œæˆ")
+                 return True

+         except Exception as e:

+             return False

+     def start_backend(self):
+         """å¯åŠ¨åç«¯APIæœåŠ¡"""
+         print("\nğŸš€ å¯åŠ¨åç«¯APIæœåŠ¡...")

+             print(f"âœ… åç«¯APIæœåŠ¡å·²å¯åŠ¨ (PID: {process.pid})")
+             print(f"   è®¿é—®åœ°å€: http://localhost:{self.backend_port}")
+             
+             # ç­‰å¾…åç«¯å¯åŠ¨
+             time.sleep(3)
+             return True
+             
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ å¯åŠ¨åç«¯å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     def start_frontend(self):
+         """å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨"""
+         print(f"\nğŸ¨ å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨...")
+         
+         try:
+             env = os.environ.copy()

+             
+             # å¯åŠ¨Viteå¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨

+                 ['npm', 'run', 'dev', '--', '--port', str(self.frontend_port), '--host'],
+                 cwd=self.project_root,
+                 env=env,
+                 stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
+                 stderr=subprocess.STDOUT,
+                 universal_newlines=True,
+                 bufsize=1
+             )
+             
+             self.processes.append(process)
+             
+             # ç­‰å¾…æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨å¹¶è¾“å‡ºæ—¥å¿—
+             startup_complete = False
+             for line in process.stdout:
+                 print(f"   {line.rstrip()}")
+                 
+                 # æ£€æµ‹å¯åŠ¨å®Œæˆ
+                 if 'Local:' in line and not startup_complete:
+                     startup_complete = True
+                     # å»¶è¿Ÿæ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨
+                     threading.Timer(2.0, self.open_browser).start()
+                     
+                 # å¦‚æœè¿›ç¨‹æ„å¤–é€€å‡ºï¼Œåœæ­¢è¯»å–
+                 if process.poll() is not None:
+                     break

+         except KeyboardInterrupt:

+         except Exception as e:

+         """æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨"""

+             webbrowser.open(url)

+             print(f"   è¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨è®¿é—®: {url}")
+     
+     def cleanup(self):
+         """æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹"""
+         print("\nğŸ§¹ æ­£åœ¨æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹...")
+         
+         for process in self.processes:
+             if process.poll() is None:  # è¿›ç¨‹è¿˜åœ¨è¿è¡Œ
+                 try:
+                     process.terminate()
+                     # ç­‰å¾…è¿›ç¨‹ç»“æŸ
+                     try:
+                         process.wait(timeout=5)
+                         print(f"   âœ… è¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid} å·²æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ")
+                     except subprocess.TimeoutExpired:
+                         process.kill()
+                         print(f"   ğŸ”ª å¼ºåˆ¶ç»“æŸè¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid}")
+                 except Exception as e:
+                     print(f"   âš ï¸  æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid} æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
+     
+     def setup_signal_handlers(self):
+         """è®¾ç½®ä¿¡å·å¤„ç†å™¨"""
+         def signal_handler(signum, frame):
+             print(f"\nğŸ“¡ æ¥æ”¶åˆ°ä¿¡å· {signum}")
+             self.cleanup()
+             sys.exit(0)
+             
+         signal.signal(signal.SIGINT, signal_handler)
+         signal.signal(signal.SIGTERM, signal_handler)
+     
+     def display_banner(self):
+         """æ˜¾ç¤ºå¯åŠ¨æ¨ªå¹…"""
+         banner = """
+ â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ“° NewsLook è´¢ç»æ–°é—»çˆ¬è™«ç³»ç»Ÿ v2.0                        â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ¨ ç°ä»£åŒ– Vue 3 + Naive UI ç•Œé¢                          â•‘
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•‘    âœ¨ ç‰¹æ€§:                                                  â•‘
+ â•‘    â€¢ ğŸš€ é«˜æ€§èƒ½ Vue 3 + Vite å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒ                       â•‘
+ â•‘    â€¢ ğŸ¯ ç°ä»£åŒ– Naive UI ç»„ä»¶åº“                              â•‘
+ â•‘    â€¢ ğŸ“Š ECharts å¯è§†åŒ–å›¾è¡¨                                  â•‘
+ â•‘    â€¢ ğŸ“± å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå®Œç¾é€‚é…å„ç§è®¾å¤‡                        â•‘
+ â•‘    â€¢ ğŸŒ™ æ·±è‰²/æµ…è‰²ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢                                   â•‘
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
+         """
+         print(banner)
+     
+     def run(self):
+         """å¯åŠ¨åº”ç”¨"""
+         try:
+             self.display_banner()
+             self.setup_signal_handlers()
+             
+             # æ£€æŸ¥ä¾èµ–
+             if not self.check_dependencies():
+                 return
+                 
+             # å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–
+             if not self.install_dependencies():
+                 return
+                 
+             # å¯åŠ¨åç«¯ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
+             self.start_backend()
+             
+             # å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯
+             self.start_frontend()
+             
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             print("\nğŸ‘‹ æ„Ÿè°¢ä½¿ç”¨ NewsLook!")
+         finally:
+             self.cleanup()
+ 
+ def main():
+     """ä¸»å‡½æ•°"""
+     launcher = FrontendLauncher()
+     launcher.run()
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ 
+ """
+ NewsLook ç®€åŒ–å‰ç«¯å¯åŠ¨å™¨
+ é€‚ç”¨äº npm ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡æœªæ­£ç¡®é…ç½®çš„æƒ…å†µ

+ 
+ import os
+ import sys
+ import subprocess
+ import webbrowser
+ import time
+ import signal
+ import threading
+ from pathlib import Path
+ 
+ class SimpleFrontendLauncher:
+     def __init__(self):
+         self.project_root = Path(__file__).parent
+         self.frontend_port = 3000
+         self.backend_port = 5000
+         self.processes = []
+         
+     def display_banner(self):
+         """æ˜¾ç¤ºå¯åŠ¨æ¨ªå¹…"""
+         banner = """
+ â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ“° NewsLook è´¢ç»æ–°é—»çˆ¬è™«ç³»ç»Ÿ v2.0                        â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ¨ ç°ä»£åŒ– Vue 3 + Naive UI ç•Œé¢                          â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ”§ ç®€åŒ–å¯åŠ¨æ¨¡å¼                                           â•‘
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
+         """
+         print(banner)

+     def check_node_installation(self):
+         """æ£€æŸ¥Node.jså®‰è£…"""
+         print("ğŸ” æ£€æŸ¥ Node.js å®‰è£…...")
+         
+         try:
+             result = subprocess.run(['node', '--version'], 
+                                    capture_output=True, text=True)
+             node_version = result.stdout.strip()
+             print(f"âœ… Node.js: {node_version}")
+             return True
+         except FileNotFoundError:
+             print("âŒ é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ° Node.js")
+             print("   è¯·é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ PowerShell æˆ–å®‰è£… Node.js")
+             return False
+     
+     def try_npm_install(self):
+         """å°è¯•å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–"""
+         print("\nğŸ“¦ å°è¯•å®‰è£…å‰ç«¯ä¾èµ–...")
+         
+         # æ£€æŸ¥package.jsonæ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
+         package_json = self.project_root / "package.json"
+         if not package_json.exists():
+             print("âŒ é”™è¯¯: æœªæ‰¾åˆ° package.json æ–‡ä»¶")
+             return False
+         
+         # å°è¯•ä¸åŒçš„npmå‘½ä»¤
+         npm_commands = [
+             ['npm', 'install'],
+             ['npx', 'npm', 'install'],
+             [str(Path(os.environ.get('PROGRAMFILES', 'C:\\Program Files')) / 'nodejs' / 'npm.cmd'), 'install']
+         ]
+         
+         for cmd in npm_commands:
+             try:
+                 print(f"   å°è¯•å‘½ä»¤: {' '.join(cmd)}")
+                 process = subprocess.run(
+                     cmd,
+                     cwd=self.project_root,
+                     capture_output=True,
+                     text=True,
+                     timeout=300  # 5åˆ†é’Ÿè¶…æ—¶
+                 )
+                 
+                 if process.returncode == 0:
+                     print("âœ… ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…æˆåŠŸ")
+                     return True
+                 else:
+                     print(f"   å‘½ä»¤å¤±è´¥: {process.stderr}")
+                     
+             except (FileNotFoundError, subprocess.TimeoutExpired) as e:
+                 print(f"   å‘½ä»¤ä¸å¯ç”¨: {e}")
+                 continue
+         
+         print("âš ï¸  æ— æ³•è‡ªåŠ¨å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–ï¼Œè¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨æ“ä½œ:")
+         print("   1. é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ PowerShell")
+         print("   2. è¿è¡Œ: npm install")
+         print("   3. è¿è¡Œ: npm run dev")
+         return False
+     
+     def try_start_dev_server(self):
+         """å°è¯•å¯åŠ¨å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨"""
+         print("\nğŸ¨ å°è¯•å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨...")
+         
+         # å°è¯•ä¸åŒçš„å¯åŠ¨å‘½ä»¤
+         dev_commands = [
+             ['npm', 'run', 'dev'],
+             ['npx', 'vite'],
+             [str(Path(os.environ.get('PROGRAMFILES', 'C:\\Program Files')) / 'nodejs' / 'npm.cmd'), 'run', 'dev']
+         ]
+         
+         for cmd in dev_commands:
+             try:
+                 print(f"   å°è¯•å‘½ä»¤: {' '.join(cmd)}")
+                 
+                 env = os.environ.copy()
+                 env['FORCE_COLOR'] = '1'
+                 env['VITE_API_BASE_URL'] = f'http://localhost:{self.backend_port}'
+                 
+                 process = subprocess.Popen(
+                     cmd,
+                     cwd=self.project_root,
+                     env=env,
+                     stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
+                     stderr=subprocess.STDOUT,
+                     universal_newlines=True,
+                     bufsize=1
+                 )
+                 
+                 self.processes.append(process)
+                 
+                 # ç­‰å¾…æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨
+                 startup_complete = False
+                 for line in process.stdout:
+                     print(f"   {line.rstrip()}")
+                     
+                     # æ£€æµ‹å¯åŠ¨å®Œæˆ
+                     if any(keyword in line for keyword in ['Local:', 'localhost', 'ready']):
+                         if not startup_complete:
+                             startup_complete = True
+                             threading.Timer(2.0, self.open_browser).start()
+                     
+                     # å¦‚æœè¿›ç¨‹æ„å¤–é€€å‡ºï¼Œåœæ­¢è¯»å–
+                     if process.poll() is not None:
+                         break
+                 
+                 return True
+                 
+             except FileNotFoundError:
+                 print(f"   å‘½ä»¤ä¸å¯ç”¨: {cmd[0]}")
+                 continue
+             except Exception as e:
+                 print(f"   å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+                 continue
+         
+         return False
+     
+     def open_browser(self):
+         """æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨"""
+         url = f"http://localhost:{self.frontend_port}"
+         print(f"\nğŸŒ æ­£åœ¨æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨: {url}")
+         
+         try:
+             webbrowser.open(url)
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"   æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+             print(f"   è¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨è®¿é—®: {url}")
+     
+     def show_manual_instructions(self):
+         """æ˜¾ç¤ºæ‰‹åŠ¨æ“ä½œè¯´æ˜"""
+         print("\nğŸ“‹ æ‰‹åŠ¨å¯åŠ¨è¯´æ˜:")
+         print("   1. é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ PowerShell (ä»¥ç®¡ç†å‘˜èº«ä»½)")
+         print("   2. å¯¼èˆªåˆ°é¡¹ç›®ç›®å½•:")
+         print(f"      cd {self.project_root}")
+         print("   3. å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–:")
+         print("      npm install")
+         print("   4. å¯åŠ¨å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨:")
+         print("      npm run dev")
+         print("   5. æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨è®¿é—®:")
+         print("      http://localhost:3000")
+         print("\nğŸ’¡ å¦‚æœ npm ä»ç„¶ä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œè¯·:")
+         print("   - é‡æ–°å®‰è£… Node.js: https://nodejs.org/")
+         print("   - ç¡®ä¿å‹¾é€‰ 'Add to PATH' é€‰é¡¹")
+         print("   - é‡å¯è®¡ç®—æœº")
+     
+     def cleanup(self):
+         """æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹"""
+         print("\nğŸ§¹ æ­£åœ¨æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹...")
+         
+         for process in self.processes:
+             if process.poll() is None:
+                 try:
+                     process.terminate()
+                     try:
+                         process.wait(timeout=5)
+                         print(f"   âœ… è¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid} å·²æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ")
+                     except subprocess.TimeoutExpired:
+                         process.kill()
+                         print(f"   ğŸ”ª å¼ºåˆ¶ç»“æŸè¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid}")
+                 except Exception as e:
+                     print(f"   âš ï¸  æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid} æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
+     
+     def setup_signal_handlers(self):
+         """è®¾ç½®ä¿¡å·å¤„ç†å™¨"""
+         def signal_handler(signum, frame):
+             print(f"\nğŸ“¡ æ¥æ”¶åˆ°ä¿¡å· {signum}")
+             self.cleanup()
+             sys.exit(0)
+             
+         signal.signal(signal.SIGINT, signal_handler)
+         signal.signal(signal.SIGTERM, signal_handler)
+     
+     def run(self):
+         """å¯åŠ¨åº”ç”¨"""
+         try:
+             self.display_banner()
+             self.setup_signal_handlers()
+             
+             # æ£€æŸ¥Node.js
+             if not self.check_node_installation():
+                 self.show_manual_instructions()
+                 return
+             
+             # å°è¯•å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–
+             deps_installed = self.try_npm_install()
+             
+             # å°è¯•å¯åŠ¨å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨
+             if deps_installed:
+                 if not self.try_start_dev_server():
+                     self.show_manual_instructions()
+             else:
+                 self.show_manual_instructions()
+                 
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             print("\nğŸ‘‹ æ„Ÿè°¢ä½¿ç”¨ NewsLook!")
+         finally:
+             self.cleanup()
+ 
+ def main():
+     """ä¸»å‡½æ•°"""
+     launcher = SimpleFrontendLauncher()
+     launcher.run()
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ 
+ import subprocess
+ import os
+ from pathlib import Path
+ 
+ def test_npm():
+     print("ğŸ” æµ‹è¯• npm å¯ç”¨æ€§...")
+     
+     # æµ‹è¯•ä¸åŒçš„npmè·¯å¾„
+     npm_paths = [
+         'npm',
+         'npm.cmd',
+         str(Path(os.environ.get('PROGRAMFILES', 'C:\\Program Files')) / 'nodejs' / 'npm.cmd'),
+         str(Path(os.environ.get('APPDATA', '')) / 'npm' / 'npm.cmd')
+     ]
+     
+     for npm_path in npm_paths:
+         try:
+             print(f"å°è¯•: {npm_path}")
+             result = subprocess.run([npm_path, '--version'], 
+                                    capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=10)
+             if result.returncode == 0:
+                 print(f"âœ… æˆåŠŸ! npm ç‰ˆæœ¬: {result.stdout.strip()}")
+                 print(f"   è·¯å¾„: {npm_path}")
+                 return npm_path
+             else:
+                 print(f"   å¤±è´¥: {result.stderr}")
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"   é”™è¯¯: {e}")
+     
+     print("âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„ npm")
+     return None
+ 
+ def test_node():
+     print("\nğŸ” æµ‹è¯• Node.js...")
+     try:
+         result = subprocess.run(['node', '--version'], 
+                                capture_output=True, text=True)
+         if result.returncode == 0:
+             print(f"âœ… Node.js ç‰ˆæœ¬: {result.stdout.strip()}")
+             return True
+         else:
+             print(f"âŒ Node.js é”™è¯¯: {result.stderr}")
+             return False
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"âŒ Node.js ä¸å¯ç”¨: {e}")
+         return False
+ 
+ def show_env_info():
+     print("\nğŸ“‹ ç¯å¢ƒä¿¡æ¯:")
+     print(f"PATH: {os.environ.get('PATH', 'N/A')[:200]}...")
+     print(f"PROGRAMFILES: {os.environ.get('PROGRAMFILES', 'N/A')}")
+     print(f"APPDATA: {os.environ.get('APPDATA', 'N/A')}")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     print("ğŸ§ª NewsLook npm ç¯å¢ƒæµ‹è¯•")
+     print("=" * 50)
+     
+     test_node()
+     npm_path = test_npm()
+     show_env_info()
+     
+     if npm_path:
+         print(f"\nâœ… å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨: {npm_path}")
+         print("\nğŸ“‹ å»ºè®®çš„å¯åŠ¨å‘½ä»¤:")
+         print(f"   {npm_path} install")
+         print(f"   {npm_path} run dev")
+     else:
+         print("\nâŒ npm ä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œè¯·:")
+         print("   1. é‡æ–°å¯åŠ¨ PowerShell")
+         print("   2. æˆ–é‡æ–°å®‰è£… Node.js")
+         print("   3. æˆ–æ‰‹åŠ¨æ·»åŠ åˆ° PATH")

çœ‹èµ·æ¥Node.jsè™½ç„¶å®‰è£…äº†ï¼Œä½†æ²¡æœ‰æ­£ç¡®æ·»åŠ åˆ°PATHã€‚è®©æˆ‘ä¸ºæ‚¨æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š

å¤ªå¥½äº†ï¼npm install æ­£åœ¨è¿è¡Œã€‚ç°åœ¨è®©æˆ‘åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªä¿®å¤åçš„å¯åŠ¨è„šæœ¬ï¼š

```diff

+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ 
+ """
+ NewsLook ä¿®å¤ç‰ˆå‰ç«¯å¯åŠ¨å™¨
+ ä½¿ç”¨æ£€æµ‹åˆ°çš„æ­£ç¡®npmè·¯å¾„
+ """
+ 
+ import os
+ import sys
+ import subprocess
+ import webbrowser
+ import time
+ import signal
+ import threading
+ from pathlib import Path
+ 
+ class FixedFrontendLauncher:
+     def __init__(self):
+         self.project_root = Path(__file__).parent
+         self.frontend_port = 3000
+         self.backend_port = 5000
+         self.processes = []
+         
+         # æ£€æµ‹åˆ°çš„npmè·¯å¾„
+         self.npm_paths = [
+             r"D:\NodeJS\npm.cmd",
+             r"C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\npm\npm.cmd"
+         ]
+         
+         self.working_npm = None
+         
+     def display_banner(self):
+         """æ˜¾ç¤ºå¯åŠ¨æ¨ªå¹…"""
+         banner = """
+ â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ“° NewsLook è´¢ç»æ–°é—»çˆ¬è™«ç³»ç»Ÿ v2.0                        â•‘
+ â•‘    ğŸ¨ ç°ä»£åŒ– Vue 3 + Naive UI ç•Œé¢                          â•‘
+ â•‘    âœ… ä¿®å¤ç‰ˆæœ¬ - ä½¿ç”¨æ­£ç¡®çš„npmè·¯å¾„                          â•‘
+ â•‘                                                              â•‘
+ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
+         """
+         print(banner)
+     
+     def find_working_npm(self):
+         """æ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„npmè·¯å¾„"""
+         print("ğŸ” æ£€æµ‹npmè·¯å¾„...")
+         
+         for npm_path in self.npm_paths:
+             try:
+                 result = subprocess.run([npm_path, '--version'], 
+                                        capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=10)
+                 if result.returncode == 0:
+                     version = result.stdout.strip()
+                     print(f"âœ… æ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„npm: {npm_path}")
+                     print(f"   ç‰ˆæœ¬: {version}")
+                     self.working_npm = npm_path
+                     return True
+             except Exception as e:
+                 print(f"   {npm_path}: ä¸å¯ç”¨ ({e})")
+                 
+         print("âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„npm")
+         return False
+     
+     def check_node(self):
+         """æ£€æŸ¥Node.js"""
+         print("\nğŸ” æ£€æŸ¥Node.js...")
+         try:
+             result = subprocess.run(['node', '--version'], 
+                                    capture_output=True, text=True)
+             if result.returncode == 0:
+                 version = result.stdout.strip()
+                 print(f"âœ… Node.js: {version}")
+                 return True
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ Node.jsä¸å¯ç”¨: {e}")
+             
+         # å°è¯•å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„
+         try:
+             result = subprocess.run([r"D:\NodeJS\node.exe", '--version'], 
+                                    capture_output=True, text=True)
+             if result.returncode == 0:
+                 version = result.stdout.strip()
+                 print(f"âœ… Node.js (å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„): {version}")
+                 return True
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ Node.jså®Œæ•´è·¯å¾„ä¹Ÿä¸å¯ç”¨: {e}")
+             
+         return False
+     
+     def install_dependencies(self):
+         """å®‰è£…å‰ç«¯ä¾èµ–"""
+         print(f"\nğŸ“¦ ä½¿ç”¨ {self.working_npm} å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–...")
+         
+         if not (self.project_root / "package.json").exists():
+             print("âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°package.json")
+             return False
+             
+         try:
+             process = subprocess.Popen(
+                 [self.working_npm, 'install'],
+                 cwd=self.project_root,
+                 stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
+                 stderr=subprocess.STDOUT,
+                 universal_newlines=True,
+                 bufsize=1
+             )
+             
+             print("   å®‰è£…è¿›åº¦:")
+             for line in process.stdout:
+                 print(f"   {line.rstrip()}")
+                 
+             process.wait()
+             
+             if process.returncode == 0:
+                 print("âœ… ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…æˆåŠŸ!")
+                 return True
+             else:
+                 print("âŒ ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…å¤±è´¥")
+                 return False
+                 
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ å®‰è£…è¿‡ç¨‹å‡ºé”™: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     def start_backend(self):
+         """å¯åŠ¨åç«¯æœåŠ¡"""
+         print(f"\nğŸš€ å¯åŠ¨åç«¯APIæœåŠ¡...")
+         
+         run_py = self.project_root / "run.py"
+         if not run_py.exists():
+             print("âš ï¸  æœªæ‰¾åˆ°run.pyï¼Œè·³è¿‡åç«¯å¯åŠ¨")
+             return True
+             
+         try:
+             process = subprocess.Popen(
+                 [sys.executable, str(run_py), "web", "--port", str(self.backend_port)],
+                 cwd=self.project_root,
+                 stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
+                 stderr=subprocess.PIPE
+             )
+             
+             self.processes.append(process)
+             print(f"âœ… åç«¯æœåŠ¡å·²å¯åŠ¨ (PID: {process.pid})")
+             print(f"   APIåœ°å€: http://localhost:{self.backend_port}")
+             
+             # ç­‰å¾…åç«¯å¯åŠ¨
+             time.sleep(3)
+             return True
+             
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ åç«¯å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     def start_frontend(self):
+         """å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨"""
+         print(f"\nğŸ¨ ä½¿ç”¨ {self.working_npm} å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨...")
+         
+         try:
+             env = os.environ.copy()
+             env['FORCE_COLOR'] = '1'
+             env['VITE_API_BASE_URL'] = f'http://localhost:{self.backend_port}'
+             
+             process = subprocess.Popen(
+                 [self.working_npm, 'run', 'dev', '--', '--port', str(self.frontend_port), '--host'],
+                 cwd=self.project_root,
+                 env=env,
+                 stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
+                 stderr=subprocess.STDOUT,
+                 universal_newlines=True,
+                 bufsize=1
+             )
+             
+             self.processes.append(process)
+             
+             print("   å¯åŠ¨æ—¥å¿—:")
+             startup_complete = False
+             
+             for line in process.stdout:
+                 print(f"   {line.rstrip()}")
+                 
+                 # æ£€æµ‹å¯åŠ¨å®Œæˆ
+                 if any(keyword in line.lower() for keyword in ['local:', 'localhost', 'ready in']):
+                     if not startup_complete:
+                         startup_complete = True
+                         threading.Timer(2.0, self.open_browser).start()
+                         
+                 # æ£€æŸ¥è¿›ç¨‹æ˜¯å¦å¼‚å¸¸é€€å‡º
+                 if process.poll() is not None:
+                     break
+                     
+             return True
+             
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             print("\nâ¹ï¸  ç”¨æˆ·ä¸­æ–­å‰ç«¯æœåŠ¡")
+             return True
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âŒ å‰ç«¯å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+             return False
+     
+     def open_browser(self):
+         """æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨"""
+         url = f"http://localhost:{self.frontend_port}"
+         print(f"\nğŸŒ æ­£åœ¨æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨: {url}")
+         
+         try:
+             webbrowser.open(url)
+             print("âœ… æµè§ˆå™¨å·²æ‰“å¼€")
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"âš ï¸  è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰“å¼€æµè§ˆå™¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+             print(f"   è¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨è®¿é—®: {url}")
+     
+     def show_success_info(self):
+         """æ˜¾ç¤ºæˆåŠŸä¿¡æ¯"""
+         print("\n" + "="*60)
+         print("ğŸ‰ NewsLook ç°ä»£åŒ–å‰ç«¯å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ!")
+         print("="*60)
+         print(f"ğŸ“± å‰ç«¯ç•Œé¢: http://localhost:{self.frontend_port}")
+         print(f"âš™ï¸  åç«¯API:  http://localhost:{self.backend_port}")
+         print("\nâœ¨ åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹æ€§:")
+         print("   â€¢ ğŸ¨ ç°ä»£åŒ–Vue 3 + Naive UIç•Œé¢")
+         print("   â€¢ ğŸ“Š EChartsæ•°æ®å¯è§†åŒ–")
+         print("   â€¢ ğŸŒ™ æ·±è‰²/æµ…è‰²ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢")
+         print("   â€¢ ğŸ“± å®Œå…¨å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡")
+         print("   â€¢ ğŸ”” å®æ—¶é€šçŸ¥ç³»ç»Ÿ")
+         print("\nâš¡ å¿«æ·é”®:")
+         print("   â€¢ Ctrl+C: åœæ­¢æœåŠ¡")
+         print("   â€¢ F5: åˆ·æ–°é¡µé¢")
+         print("="*60)
+     
+     def cleanup(self):
+         """æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹"""
+         if self.processes:
+             print("\nğŸ§¹ æ­£åœ¨æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹...")
+             
+             for process in self.processes:
+                 if process.poll() is None:
+                     try:
+                         process.terminate()
+                         try:
+                             process.wait(timeout=5)
+                             print(f"   âœ… è¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid} å·²æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ")
+                         except subprocess.TimeoutExpired:
+                             process.kill()
+                             print(f"   ğŸ”ª å¼ºåˆ¶ç»“æŸè¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid}")
+                     except Exception as e:
+                         print(f"   âš ï¸  æ¸…ç†è¿›ç¨‹ {process.pid} æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
+     
+     def setup_signal_handlers(self):
+         """è®¾ç½®ä¿¡å·å¤„ç†å™¨"""
+         def signal_handler(signum, frame):
+             print(f"\nğŸ“¡ æ¥æ”¶åˆ°ä¿¡å· {signum}")
+             self.cleanup()
+             print("ğŸ‘‹ æ„Ÿè°¢ä½¿ç”¨ NewsLook!")
+             sys.exit(0)
+             
+         signal.signal(signal.SIGINT, signal_handler)
+         signal.signal(signal.SIGTERM, signal_handler)
+     
+     def run(self):
+         """ä¸»è¿è¡Œæµç¨‹"""
+         try:
+             self.display_banner()
+             self.setup_signal_handlers()
+             
+             # æ£€æŸ¥ç¯å¢ƒ
+             if not self.check_node():
+                 print("\nâŒ Node.jsç¯å¢ƒæ£€æŸ¥å¤±è´¥")
+                 return
+                 
+             if not self.find_working_npm():
+                 print("\nâŒ npmç¯å¢ƒæ£€æŸ¥å¤±è´¥")
+                 return
+             
+             # å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–
+             if not self.install_dependencies():
+                 print("\nâŒ ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…å¤±è´¥")
+                 return
+             
+             # å¯åŠ¨åç«¯
+             self.start_backend()
+             
+             # æ˜¾ç¤ºæˆåŠŸä¿¡æ¯
+             self.show_success_info()
+             
+             # å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯ (è¿™ä¼šé˜»å¡ç›´åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·åœæ­¢)
+             self.start_frontend()
+             
+         except KeyboardInterrupt:
+             print("\nğŸ‘‹ æ„Ÿè°¢ä½¿ç”¨ NewsLook!")
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"\nâŒ å¯åŠ¨è¿‡ç¨‹å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯: {e}")
+         finally:
+             self.cleanup()
+ 
+ def main():
+     """ä¸»å‡½æ•°"""
+     launcher = FixedFrontendLauncher()
+     launcher.run()
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main() 
```

## ğŸ‰ è·¯å¾„éªŒè¯æˆåŠŸï¼ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥å¯åŠ¨å‰ç«¯äº†

### âœ… éªŒè¯ç»“æœæ€»ç»“

1. **Node.js**: `D:\NodeJS\node.exe` - å·¥ä½œæ­£å¸¸ âœ…
2. **npm**: `D:\NodeJS\npm.cmd` - ç‰ˆæœ¬ 11.4.1 âœ…  
3. **npm (AppData)**: `C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\npm\npm.cmd` - ä¹Ÿå¯ç”¨ âœ…
4. **PATHé…ç½®**: å·²åŒ…å«ç›¸å…³è·¯å¾„ âœ…

### ğŸš€ ç°åœ¨å°±å¯åŠ¨ä¿®å¤ç‰ˆå‰ç«¯

æˆ‘å·²ç»åˆ›å»ºäº†`start_frontend_fixed.py`ï¼Œå®ƒä½¿ç”¨æ£€æµ‹åˆ°çš„æ­£ç¡®npmè·¯å¾„ã€‚è®©æˆ‘å¯åŠ¨å®ƒï¼š

---

```bash
python start_frontend_fixed.py
```

```
   å¯åŠ¨æ—¥å¿—:
   
   > newslook-frontend@2.0.0 dev
   > vite --port 3000 --host

   
     VITE v5.4.19  ready in 270 ms

+       title: `ç¤ºä¾‹æ–°é—»æ ‡é¢˜ ${(pagination.page - 1) * pagination.pageSize + i + 1}`,
+       content: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡ç¤ºä¾‹æ–°é—»å†…å®¹ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºæ–°é—»ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢çš„åŠŸèƒ½...',
+       content_html: '<p>è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡ç¤ºä¾‹æ–°é—»å†…å®¹ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºæ–°é—»ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢çš„åŠŸèƒ½...</p>',
+       source: sourceOptions.value[i % sourceOptions.value.length].label,
+       author: `ä½œè€…${i + 1}`,
+       pub_time: new Date(Date.now() - Math.random() * 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
+       url: `https://example.com/news/${i + 1}`
+     }))
+     
+     pagination.itemCount = 1000 // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ€»æ•°
+     
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('åŠ è½½æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     message.error('åŠ è½½æ–°é—»åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥')
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ
+ onMounted(() => {
+   loadNewsList()
+ })
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .news-page {
+   padding: 20px;
+ }

+                :key="`preview-${index}`"
+                :src="image" 
+                style="display: none;" />
+     </n-image-group>
+   </div>

+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, computed, onMounted } from 'vue'
+ import { useRoute, useRouter } from 'vue-router'
+ import { useMessage } from 'naive-ui'
+ import {
+   NPageHeader, NCard, NSpin, NSpace, NButton, NIcon, NTag, NText,
+   NGrid, NGridItem, NEmpty, NDescriptions, NDescriptionsItem,
+   NImage, NImageGroup, NResult
+ } from 'naive-ui'
+ import {
+   ShareSocial, Print, OpenOutline, Person, Time, Eye
+ } from '@vicons/ionicons5'
+ 
+ // è·¯ç”±å’Œæ¶ˆæ¯
+ const route = useRoute()
+ const router = useRouter()
+ const message = useMessage()
+ 
+ // å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const newsDetail = ref(null)
+ 
+ // è®¡ç®—å±æ€§
+ const contentParagraphs = computed(() => {
+   if (!newsDetail.value?.content) return []
+   return newsDetail.value.content.split('\n').filter(p => p.trim())
+ })
+ 
+ const keywordList = computed(() => {
+   if (!newsDetail.value?.keywords) return []
+   try {
+     return typeof newsDetail.value.keywords === 'string' 
+       ? JSON.parse(newsDetail.value.keywords)
+       : newsDetail.value.keywords
+   } catch {
+     return newsDetail.value.keywords.split(',').map(k => k.trim())
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ const stockList = computed(() => {
+   if (!newsDetail.value?.related_stocks) return []
+   try {
+     return typeof newsDetail.value.related_stocks === 'string'
+       ? JSON.parse(newsDetail.value.related_stocks)
+       : newsDetail.value.related_stocks
+   } catch {
+     return newsDetail.value.related_stocks.split(',').map(s => s.trim())
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ const imageList = computed(() => {
+   if (!newsDetail.value?.images) return []
+   try {
+     return typeof newsDetail.value.images === 'string'
+       ? JSON.parse(newsDetail.value.images)
+       : newsDetail.value.images
+   } catch {
+     return newsDetail.value.images.split(',').map(img => img.trim()).filter(img => img)
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ // æ–¹æ³•
+ const handleBack = () => {
+   router.back()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleShare = () => {
+   const url = window.location.href
+   const title = newsDetail.value?.title || 'æ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…'
+   
+   if (navigator.share) {
+     navigator.share({
+       title: title,
+       url: url
+     }).catch(err => {
+       console.log('åˆ†äº«å¤±è´¥:', err)
+       copyToClipboard(url)
+     })
+   } else {
+     copyToClipboard(url)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const handlePrint = () => {
+   window.print()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleOpenOriginal = () => {
+   if (newsDetail.value?.url) {
+     window.open(newsDetail.value.url, '_blank')
+   } else {
+     message.warning('åŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ä¸å¯ç”¨')
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const handleImagePreview = (imageUrl) => {
+   // Naive UI çš„å›¾ç‰‡é¢„è§ˆä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†
+ }
+ 
+ const copyToClipboard = (text) => {
+   if (navigator.clipboard) {
+     navigator.clipboard.writeText(text).then(() => {
+       message.success('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿')
+     }).catch(() => {
+       fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(text)
+     })
+   } else {
+     fallbackCopyTextToClipboard(text)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const fallbackCopyTextToClipboard = (text) => {
+   const textArea = document.createElement('textarea')
+   textArea.value = text
+   document.body.appendChild(textArea)
+   textArea.focus()
+   textArea.select()
+   
+   try {
+     document.execCommand('copy')
+     message.success('é“¾æ¥å·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿')
+   } catch (err) {
+     message.error('å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤åˆ¶')
+   }
+   
+   document.body.removeChild(textArea)
+ }
+ 
+ // å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
+ const getSourceType = (source) => {
+   const typeMap = {
+     'ä¸œæ–¹è´¢å¯Œ': 'success',
+     'æ–°æµªè´¢ç»': 'info',
+     'è…¾è®¯è´¢ç»': 'warning',
+     'ç½‘æ˜“è´¢ç»': 'error',
+     'å‡¤å‡°è´¢ç»': 'default'
+   }
+   return typeMap[source] || 'default'
+ }
+ 
+ const getSentimentType = (sentiment) => {
+   const typeMap = {
+     'positive': 'success',
+     'negative': 'error',
+     'neutral': 'default'
+   }
+   return typeMap[sentiment] || 'default'
+ }
+ 
+ const getSentimentText = (sentiment) => {
+   const textMap = {
+     'positive': 'ç§¯æ',
+     'negative': 'æ¶ˆæ', 
+     'neutral': 'ä¸­æ€§'
+   }
+   return textMap[sentiment] || 'æœªçŸ¥'
+ }
+ 
+ const formatDate = (dateStr) => {
+   if (!dateStr) return '-'
+   const date = new Date(dateStr)
+   return date.toLocaleString('zh-CN', {
+     year: 'numeric',
+     month: '2-digit',
+     day: '2-digit',
+     hour: '2-digit',
+     minute: '2-digit',
+     second: '2-digit'
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // åŠ è½½æ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…
+ const loadNewsDetail = async () => {
+   const newsId = route.params.id
+   if (!newsId) {
+     message.error('æ–°é—»IDä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º')
+     return
+   }
+ 
+   loading.value = true
+   try {
+     // æ¨¡æ‹ŸAPIè°ƒç”¨
+     await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 800))
+     
+     // è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥è°ƒç”¨å®é™…çš„API
+     // const response = await newsApi.getNewsDetail(newsId)
+     // newsDetail.value = response.data
+     
+     // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®
+     newsDetail.value = {
+       id: newsId,
+       title: `ç¤ºä¾‹æ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…æ ‡é¢˜ - ${newsId}`,
+       content: `è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡è¯¦ç»†çš„æ–°é—»å†…å®¹ã€‚\n\nåŒ…å«å¤šä¸ªæ®µè½çš„æ–°é—»æ­£æ–‡ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºå®Œæ•´çš„æ–°é—»ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚\n\nç¬¬ä¸‰æ®µè½å†…å®¹ï¼Œç”¨äºæ¼”ç¤ºæ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºæ•ˆæœã€‚`,
+       content_html: `<p>è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡è¯¦ç»†çš„æ–°é—»å†…å®¹ã€‚</p><p>åŒ…å«å¤šä¸ªæ®µè½çš„æ–°é—»æ­£æ–‡ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºå®Œæ•´çš„æ–°é—»ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚</p><p>ç¬¬ä¸‰æ®µè½å†…å®¹ï¼Œç”¨äºæ¼”ç¤ºæ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…é¡µé¢çš„æ˜¾ç¤ºæ•ˆæœã€‚</p>`,
+       source: 'æ–°æµªè´¢ç»',
+       author: 'è´¢ç»ç¼–è¾‘',
+       pub_time: new Date(Date.now() - Math.random() * 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString(),
+       crawl_time: new Date().toISOString(),
+       url: `https://example.com/news/${newsId}`,
+       category: 'è‚¡ç¥¨',
+       sentiment: 'positive',
+       view_count: Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000) + 100,
+       keywords: JSON.stringify(['è‚¡ç¥¨', 'è´¢ç»', 'æŠ•èµ„', 'å¸‚åœº']),
+       related_stocks: JSON.stringify(['000001.SZ', '000002.SZ', '600000.SS']),
+       images: JSON.stringify([
+         'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200/4f46e5/ffffff?text=News+Image+1',
+         'https://via.placeholder.com/300x200/06b6d4/ffffff?text=News+Image+2'
+       ])
+     }
+     
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('åŠ è½½æ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     message.error('åŠ è½½æ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…å¤±è´¥')
+     newsDetail.value = null
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ
+ onMounted(() => {
+   loadNewsDetail()
+ })
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .news-detail-page {

+       <n-form-item label="æ¡Œé¢é€šçŸ¥">
+         <n-switch v-model:value="desktopNotification" @update:value="handleNotificationToggle">
+           <template #checked>å¼€å¯</template>
+           <template #unchecked>å…³é—­</template>
+         </n-switch>
+       </n-form-item>
+       <n-form-item label="å£°éŸ³æé†’">
+         <n-switch v-model:value="soundNotification">
+           <template #checked>å¼€å¯</template>
+           <template #unchecked>å…³é—­</template>
+         </n-switch>
+       </n-form-item>
+       <n-form-item label="é‚®ä»¶é€šçŸ¥">
+         <n-switch v-model:value="emailNotification">
+           <template #checked">å¼€å¯</template>
+           <template #unchecked>å…³é—­</template>
+         </n-switch>
+       </n-form-item>
+     </n-card>
+ 
+     <!-- é«˜çº§è®¾ç½® -->
+     <n-card title="âš™ï¸ é«˜çº§è®¾ç½®" size="small" class="setting-card">
+       <n-form-item label="å¼€å‘è€…æ¨¡å¼">
+         <n-switch v-model:value="developerMode">
+           <template #checked>å¼€å¯</template>
+           <template #unchecked>å…³é—­</template>
+         </n-switch>
+       </n-form-item>
+       <n-form-item label="æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§">
+         <n-switch v-model:value="performanceMonitor">
+           <template #checked>å¼€å¯</template>
+           <template #unchecked>å…³é—­</template>
+         </n-switch>
+       </n-form-item>
+       <n-form-item label="è°ƒè¯•æ—¥å¿—">
+         <n-switch v-model:value="debugMode">
+           <template #checked>å¼€å¯</template>
+           <template #unchecked>å…³é—­</template>
+         </n-switch>
+       </n-form-item>
+     </n-card>
+ 
+     <!-- æ“ä½œæŒ‰é’® -->
+     <div class="settings-actions">
+       <n-space>
+         <n-button type="primary" @click="handleSaveSettings">
+           <template #icon>
+             <n-icon :component="SaveOutline" />
+           </template>
+           ä¿å­˜è®¾ç½®
+         </n-button>
+         <n-button @click="handleResetSettings">
+           <template #icon>
+             <n-icon :component="RefreshOutline" />
+           </template>
+           é‡ç½®é»˜è®¤
+         </n-button>
+         <n-button @click="handleExportSettings">
+           <template #icon>
+             <n-icon :component="DownloadOutline" />
+           </template>
+           å¯¼å‡ºé…ç½®
+         </n-button>
+       </n-space>
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>

+ <script setup>
+ import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue'
+ import { useMessage } from 'naive-ui'
+ import {
+   NCard, NFormItem, NRadioGroup, NRadioButton, NColorPicker, NSwitch,
+   NSelect, NInputNumber, NSpace, NButton, NIcon
+ } from 'naive-ui'
+ import { SaveOutline, RefreshOutline, DownloadOutline } from '@vicons/ionicons5'
+ 
+ const message = useMessage()
+ 
+ // å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®
+ const themeMode = ref('light')
+ const primaryColor = ref('#2080f0')
+ const sidebarCollapsed = ref(false)
+ const showBreadcrumb = ref(true)
+ const pageAnimation = ref(true)
+ const autoRefresh = ref(false)
+ const refreshInterval = ref(30)
+ const pageSize = ref(20)
+ const desktopNotification = ref(false)
+ const soundNotification = ref(true)
+ const emailNotification = ref(false)
+ const developerMode = ref(false)
+ const performanceMonitor = ref(false)
+ const debugMode = ref(false)
+ 
+ // é€‰é¡¹æ•°æ®
+ const refreshOptions = [
+   { label: '15ç§’', value: 15 },
+   { label: '30ç§’', value: 30 },
+   { label: '1åˆ†é’Ÿ', value: 60 },
+   { label: '5åˆ†é’Ÿ', value: 300 },
+   { label: '10åˆ†é’Ÿ', value: 600 }
+ ]
+ 
+ // æ–¹æ³•
+ const handleThemeChange = (value) => {
+   localStorage.setItem('themeMode', value)
+   message.success(`ä¸»é¢˜å·²åˆ‡æ¢ä¸º${value === 'light' ? 'æµ…è‰²' : value === 'dark' ? 'æ·±è‰²' : 'è·Ÿéšç³»ç»Ÿ'}æ¨¡å¼`)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleColorChange = (value) => {
+   localStorage.setItem('primaryColor', value)
+   message.success('ä¸»è‰²è°ƒå·²æ›´æ–°')
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSidebarToggle = (value) => {
+   // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡äº‹ä»¶æˆ–çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†é€šçŸ¥çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶
+   message.info(`ä¾§è¾¹æ å·²è®¾ç½®ä¸º${value ? 'æ”¶èµ·' : 'å±•å¼€'}çŠ¶æ€`)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleAutoRefreshToggle = (value) => {
+   if (value) {
+     message.success('è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°å·²å¼€å¯')
+   } else {
+     message.info('è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°å·²å…³é—­')
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const handleRefreshIntervalChange = (value) => {
+   const interval = refreshOptions.find(opt => opt.value === value)
+   message.success(`åˆ·æ–°é—´éš”å·²è®¾ç½®ä¸º${interval.label}`)
+ }
+ 
+ const handlePageSizeChange = (value) => {
+   localStorage.setItem('pageSize', value.toString())
+   message.success(`æ¯é¡µæ˜¾ç¤ºæ•°é‡å·²è®¾ç½®ä¸º${value}æ¡`)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleNotificationToggle = (value) => {
+   if (value && 'Notification' in window) {
+     Notification.requestPermission().then(permission => {
+       if (permission === 'granted') {
+         message.success('æ¡Œé¢é€šçŸ¥å·²å¼€å¯')
+       } else {
+         desktopNotification.value = false
+         message.warning('éœ€è¦æˆæƒæ‰èƒ½å¼€å¯æ¡Œé¢é€šçŸ¥')
+       }
+     })
+   } else if (!value) {
+     message.info('æ¡Œé¢é€šçŸ¥å·²å…³é—­')
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSaveSettings = () => {
+   // ä¿å­˜æ‰€æœ‰è®¾ç½®åˆ°æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨
+   const settings = {
+     themeMode: themeMode.value,
+     primaryColor: primaryColor.value,
+     sidebarCollapsed: sidebarCollapsed.value,
+     showBreadcrumb: showBreadcrumb.value,
+     pageAnimation: pageAnimation.value,
+     autoRefresh: autoRefresh.value,
+     refreshInterval: refreshInterval.value,
+     pageSize: pageSize.value,
+     desktopNotification: desktopNotification.value,
+     soundNotification: soundNotification.value,
+     emailNotification: emailNotification.value,
+     developerMode: developerMode.value,
+     performanceMonitor: performanceMonitor.value,
+     debugMode: debugMode.value
+   }
+   
+   localStorage.setItem('userSettings', JSON.stringify(settings))
+   message.success('è®¾ç½®å·²ä¿å­˜')
+ }
+ 
+ const handleResetSettings = () => {
+   // é‡ç½®ä¸ºé»˜è®¤å€¼
+   themeMode.value = 'light'
+   primaryColor.value = '#2080f0'
+   sidebarCollapsed.value = false
+   showBreadcrumb.value = true
+   pageAnimation.value = true
+   autoRefresh.value = false
+   refreshInterval.value = 30
+   pageSize.value = 20
+   desktopNotification.value = false
+   soundNotification.value = true
+   emailNotification.value = false
+   developerMode.value = false
+   performanceMonitor.value = false
+   debugMode.value = false
+   
+   localStorage.removeItem('userSettings')
+   message.success('è®¾ç½®å·²é‡ç½®ä¸ºé»˜è®¤å€¼')
+ }
+ 
+ const handleExportSettings = () => {
+   const settings = {
+     themeMode: themeMode.value,
+     primaryColor: primaryColor.value,
+     sidebarCollapsed: sidebarCollapsed.value,
+     showBreadcrumb: showBreadcrumb.value,
+     pageAnimation: pageAnimation.value,
+     autoRefresh: autoRefresh.value,
+     refreshInterval: refreshInterval.value,
+     pageSize: pageSize.value,
+     desktopNotification: desktopNotification.value,
+     soundNotification: soundNotification.value,
+     emailNotification: emailNotification.value,
+     developerMode: developerMode.value,
+     performanceMonitor: performanceMonitor.value,
+     debugMode: debugMode.value
+   }
+   
+   const dataStr = JSON.stringify(settings, null, 2)
+   const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' })
+   const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob)
+   
+   const link = document.createElement('a')
+   link.href = url
+   link.download = 'newslook-settings.json'
+   document.body.appendChild(link)
+   link.click()
+   document.body.removeChild(link)
+   URL.revokeObjectURL(url)
+   
+   message.success('è®¾ç½®é…ç½®å·²å¯¼å‡º')
+ }
+ 
+ // åŠ è½½ä¿å­˜çš„è®¾ç½®
+ const loadSettings = () => {
+   const saved = localStorage.getItem('userSettings')
+   if (saved) {
+     try {
+       const settings = JSON.parse(saved)
+       Object.assign({
+         themeMode,
+         primaryColor,
+         sidebarCollapsed,
+         showBreadcrumb,
+         pageAnimation,
+         autoRefresh,
+         refreshInterval,
+         pageSize,
+         desktopNotification,
+         soundNotification,
+         emailNotification,
+         developerMode,
+         performanceMonitor,
+         debugMode
+       }, settings)
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('åŠ è½½è®¾ç½®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ
+ onMounted(() => {
+   loadSettings()
+ })
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .settings-panel {
+   display: flex;
+   flex-direction: column;
+   gap: 16px;
+   padding: 4px;
+ }
+ 
+ .setting-card {
+   margin-bottom: 0;
+ }
+ 
+ .setting-card :deep(.n-card-header) {
+   padding-bottom: 12px;
+ }
+ 
+ .setting-card :deep(.n-form-item) {
+   margin-bottom: 16px;
+ }
+ 
+ .setting-card :deep(.n-form-item:last-child) {
+   margin-bottom: 0;
+ }
+ 
+ .settings-actions {
+   margin-top: 8px;
+   padding-top: 16px;
+   border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
+ }
+ 
+ .settings-actions .n-space {
+   width: 100%;
+   justify-content: center;
+ }

+     padding: 0;

+     flex-direction: column;
+   }

+     width: 100%;
+   }
+ }
+ </style> 
```
